meanings: obstinately insist on doing one´s own cleaning

vlive.korean: 굳이? Why would you? 듣기 View video OSEN : Weeekly 위클리, 상큼 발랄 소녀들이 왔다 #연습실챌린지 01
굳이... Do I have... 듣기 View video AB6IX : 심야동방🌜 #2
그렇게 뭔가 굳이 염색을... So they thought you wouldn't... 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
디저트 굳이 챙겨 먹진 않는데 먹으면... I'm not really a dessert person. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 웃지마요 찍찍🐭
vlive.english: I'm not really a dessert person.

vlive.korean: 아니, 굳이 왜 맞춰? 우리끼리 가 - 그런 거야? Don't try to go along with it. Let's do our thing. - Should we? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : 투턱곰 X 몬스타엑스 뉴트로랜드 파티
vlive.english: Don't try to go along with it. Let's do our thing. - Should we?

examples.korean: Hardly anyone has bothered to reply. 발음듣기 거의 아무도 굳이 대꾸를 하려 들지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hardly anyone has bothered to reply. 발음

examples.korean: Oh, very well, then, if you insist. 발음듣기 아, 그래요, 그럼. 당신이 굳이 그러겠다면, 뭐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh, very well, then, if you insist. 발음

examples.korean: He never bothers to do his jacket up. 발음듣기 그는 생전 재킷의 단추를 굳이 채우려 하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He never bothers to do his jacket up. 발음

examples.korean: It’s from my boyfriend, if you must know. 발음듣기 굳이 알고 싶다면, 이건 내 남자 친구에게서 온 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s from my boyfriend, if you must know. 발음

examples.korean: Ordinarily, she wouldn’t have bothered arguing with him. 발음듣기 보통 때 같았으면 그녀가 그와 굳이 다투려고 하지 않았을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ordinarily, she wouldn’t have bothered arguing with him. 발음
